android.manifestAdditions:
<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <supports-screens android:anyDensity="true" android:largeScreens="true" android:normalScreens="true" android:smallScreens="true" />
<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE" /> <!-- float bobble --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW" /> <!-- home --> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.GET_TASKS" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_CONFIGURATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.CHANGE_WIFI_STATE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" /> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS" />
<uses-sdk android:minSdkVersion="14" android:targetSdkVersion="22" />
<application android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.bobble.ExceptionApplacation" android:theme="@style/AppTheme" > <!-- activity --> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterInvitationCodeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterMsgActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPwdManagerActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPwdNoChangeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterBrushLittleActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPhoneChangeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustUnspecified|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterBrushLittle2Activity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustUnspecified|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPwdTradeChangeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustUnspecified|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPwdLoginChangeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustUnspecified|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterGiftActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterInfoActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPayOrderActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterWalletActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterAccountChangeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterAccountUpgradeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPayRedPacketActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPayCashActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPaySureActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPayBillDetailActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGLoginActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGInitAndUpdateActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:screenOrientation="sensor" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGRegisterPhoneActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGRegisterUserActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGRegisterSetPasswordActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGFindPasswordVerifyCodeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGFindPasswordSetActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" android:windowSoftInputMode="adjustPan|stateHidden" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPhoneChangeNewActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPayWapActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGLoginAutoActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterWalletBeforeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterWalletRechargeActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGLoginOutActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPhoneBindActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGPersonalCenterPwdTradeSetActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <activity android:name="com.anguotech.sdk.activity.AGMessageActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|screenSize" /> <!-- alipaysafe --> <activity android:name="com.alipay.sdk.app.H5PayActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="behind" > </activity> <activity android:name="com.alipay.sdk.auth.AuthActivity" android:configChanges="orientation|keyboardHidden|navigation" android:exported="false" android:screenOrientation="behind" > </activity>
<meta-data android:name="GAMESCREEN" android:value="0" />
<!-- 配置渠道初始化参数, 如果在代码中也传递了参数，优先取代码中参数 init start--> <meta-data android:name="appKey" android:value="f8ad685fcaf0e92b2fe9c5c7c822610e" /> <meta-data android:name="payID" android:value="100246" />
</application> </manifest>
